::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer grinns as the bot accepts to be part of the 
Alliance. "Great! Welcome in!"

He puts a hand out for Bigfish to shake. "We're at a battle right 
now, we gotta get back and defend the base. Can you swim fast?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Big fish" <Bigfish1011@h...> wrote:
> :::Bigfish:::
> 
> Bigfish was surprised again that this bot was part of the strongest 
clan on 
> this world.  He didnt want to be against them.  Bigfish also liked 
the idea 
> of fighting other bots, this excited Bigfish.  He swam up to the 
bot known 
> as DevilDuer.  a stream of bubbles flowed behind him.  DevilDuer 
looked calm 
> and very pord of himself.  Bigfish new this was the clan to be 
in.  "I 
> except your offer DevilDuer. I want to join you and be apart of The 
> Alliance. I will be loyal to your leader and obay all orders." 
Bigfish bowed 
> his head very slitly to show his respect.
